scripts.build: $(npm bin)/babel --optional es7.objectRestSpread src/ -d dist/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css web && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts web
scripts.demo-watch: $(npm bin)/watchify --extension=.jsx -d -e src/demo.jsx -t [ babelify --optional es7.objectRestSpread ] -s CarbonDream -o test/index.js -v
scripts.demo-build: $(npm bin)/browserify --extension=.jsx -e src/demo.jsx -t [ babelify --optional es7.objectRestSpread ] -s CarbonDream -o test/index.js && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css web && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts web
